thread.title: 22 Vegan Recipes for People Who Aren't Vegan

author: Mayukh Sen
title: 22 Vegan Recipes for People Who Aren't Vegan
text:
22 Vegan Recipes for People Who Aren't Vegan New to Alternative Flour? Start With These 9 Recipes Get Inspired for the New Year the Old-School Way Persian New Year's Noodle Soup Uri Scheft's Yemeni Kubaneh ␡ Follow friends and influencers By following your friends and influencers you'll be able to see what they're saving in real time. Cooking is more fun with friends. Find your friends who are already on Food52, and invite others who aren't to join. If you like it, save it! 
Save and organize all of the stuff you love in one place. Got it! 
Click the heart, it's called favoriting. Favorite the stuff you like. Got it! ✉ Email 
When I'm feeling a little dangerous, I'll sometimes abandon my carnivorous leanings and opt for some vegan fare. Deviant social behavior, I know. But the good news is I don't feel like a wisp of a person the day after—I feel as satisfied as I would if I hewed to my normal diet chock full of meat-based proteins (thank you, meat-free proteins, non-burger burgers, and dairy-free cookies). 
Here are 22 vegan dishes that'll satiate any non-vegan: Advertisement
